comments: Maria\'s teaching methods are definitely not for all. It feels like she uses the same methods as with her younger students (questionable if you ask me). Also, she can be pretty mean to non-music students.
I\'m glad I switched to Julie McKenzie. She\'s helped me develop my sound so much more than Maria did. Maria also spent way too much time talking about herself in lessons.
She\'s okay. Somehow, I think she\'s better off teaching little kids because she talks about them so much during lessons.
